name: Revenge of the Killer Donuts
description:
Do you have what it takes to survive hoards of angry donuts wanting revenge after you tried to eat their king? It's time to find out!

If you survive long enough, you may just make it to the boss level

Controls: A controller is needed to play this game

  • Move: Left joystick
  • Aim and shoot: Right joystick

This game was made as a solo project for the WWU 2020 Game Jam using the themes: DONUTS_ARE_ENEMIES, Mischievous Game Designer, One Missing Asset, and Free
